Description:
Our client in UAE are looking for  Paediatrician  who is fully responsible to provide high standard of clinical care and expertise in assessment, investigation, diagnosis and treatment of patients in paediatricsJob Responsibilities Conduct regular thorough examinations on newborns and young children to check and record their health and normal physical development
Reach an informed diagnosis based on scientific knowledge and individual medical history
Keep abreast of advancements in paediatrics and best practices by attending seminars and conferences
Advise parents on children’s diet, exercise and disease preventive measures
Prepare and administer vaccines according to the governmental vaccination plan
Keep updated records of patients’ illnesses, surgeries or other medical episodes
Recommend and manage treatment, medication, therapy, vaccinations and additional specialized medical care to prevent or treat diseases, injuries and illnesses; monitor progress and conditions and revise treatments as needed
Advise and educate patients, parents and members of the community in regards to activity, diet, hygiene and other disease prevention methods
Coordinate and supervise activities of therapists, assistants, nurses, students and other support staff; refer patients to a specialist or other physician when warranted Skills
Skills:
Proven experience as a pediatrician
Medical Degree with specialization in pediatrics
Valid license to practice medicine
Minimum five years of pediatric experience
In depth knowledge of children epidemiology and infectious diseases
Exquisite knowledge of diagnostic, treatment and rehabilitation principles and techniques
